item.title: 比特币十年来首次脱离股市涨势
item.description: 彭博社汇编的数据显示，2025 年，S&P 500 指数攀升了 16% 以上，而比特币却下跌了 3%；这是自 2014 年以来首次出现股票上涨而代币下跌的情况。【原文：The S&P 500 has climbed more than 16% in 2025, while Bitcoin is down 3% — the first time since 2014 that stocks have rallied while the token is down, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 乌克兰称袭击了俄罗斯石油公司 Syzran 炼油厂和亚速海港口
item.description: 乌克兰说，它袭击了俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）的 Syzran 炼油厂和俄罗斯亚速海沿岸的一个小港口。【原文：Ukraine said it attacked Rosneft PJSC’s Syzran refinery and a small port on Russia’s Azov Sea coast, adding to spate of recent strikes that are becoming costly for Moscow and the country’s oil industry.】

item.title: 哈塞特支持美联储主席应居住在各地区的呼吁
item.description: 国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）支持财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的呼吁，即在任命联邦储备银行行长时新设居住地要求。【原文：National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett backed Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s call for a new residency requirement in the appointment of presidents of Federal Reserve banks.】

item.title: 爱尔兰贷款机构 Permanent TSB 为重新引入奖金敞开大门
item.description: 永久性 TSB 集团控股公司已与工会达成协议，明年将增加工资，并将就重新为员工发放奖金一事进行谈判。【原文：Permanent TSB Group Holdings Plc has reached an agreement with unions to increase pay next year and will enter negotiation about reintroducing bonuses for its staffers.】

item.title: Pinebridge 认为新兴市场的反弹倾向于债券
item.description: Pinebridge Investments 预计，随着美元重新走强，明年新兴市场资产的涨势将向固定收益倾斜，并远离货币。【原文：Pinebridge Investments expects the rally in emerging-market assets to tilt toward fixed income next year and away from currencies as the dollar regains strength.】

item.title: 加拿大就业岗位第三个月意外增加 5.36 万个
item.description: 加拿大经济在 11 月份增加了 5.36 万个就业岗位，连续第三个月出人意料地实现强劲就业增长，而美国的关税则减缓了经济活动。【原文：The Canadian economy added 53,600 jobs in November, making it the third consecutive month of surprisingly strong job gains as US tariffs otherwise slow down activity.】

item.title: 阿布扎比基金阻止 8 亿美元私人股权资产大洗牌
item.description: 一家总部位于休斯顿的私募股权投资公司在试图将其一项资产出售给自己时，因一名投资者喊冤而停滞不前，这是此类纠纷首次出现在公众视野中。【原文：A Houston-based private equity firm was stopped in its tracks when an investor cried foul as it tried to sell one of its assets to itself, one of the first times such a dispute has spilled into public view.】

item.title: EQT 和 PAI 成为 20 亿欧元保险经纪公司 Global 的竞购者之一
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 EQT AB、PAI Partners 和 Stone Point 已入围德国保险经纪公司 Global Group 的竞标。【原文：Private equity firms EQT AB, PAI Partners and Stone Point have been shortlisted in the bidding for German insurance brokerage Global Group, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 纽瑟姆因汽油进口问题引发湾区城镇叛乱
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）计划防止汽油价格飙升，但这座位于旧金山海湾的小城对他的计划构成了巨大障碍。【原文：A small city perched on San Francisco Bay poses a big obstacle to California Governor Gavin Newsom’s plans to prevent gasoline price spikes in a state that already pays more at the pump than any other.】

item.title: 黄金上涨，黄金支持 ETF 持仓量创月末纪录
item.description: 交易所交易基金的黄金持有量攀升至月末峰值，这表明投资者的流入继续为金银炙手可热的涨势火上浇油。【原文：Gold holdings in exchange-traded funds climbed to a month-end peak, a sign that investor inflows are continuing to add fuel to bullion’s scorching rally.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）在融资谈判中注意到债券持有人对塞内加尔债务的担忧
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）本周在与塞内加尔进行了最新一轮会谈后表示，该组织了解债券持有人对塞内加尔可能不得不进行债务重组的担忧。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is aware of bondholders’ concerns that Senegal may have to restructure its debt, the lender said this week after the latest round of talks with the West African country.】

item.title: Netflix 为华纳兄弟交易举债 590 亿美元
item.description: Netflix 公司已从华尔街银行获得了 590 亿美元的融资，以支持其收购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Netflix Inc. has lined up $59 billion of financing from Wall Street banks to help support its planned acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., which would make it one of the largest ever loans of its kind.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚政府预计到 2026 年年中完成债务重组
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚财政部长艾哈迈德-希德（Ahmed Shide）表示，埃塞俄比亚的目标是在 2026 年中期完成 20 国集团共同框架下的债务重组进程。【原文：Ethiopia aims to conclude its debt-restructuring process under the Group of 20 Common Framework by mid-2026, Finance Minister Ahmed Shide said.】

item.title: 贝莱德、Blackstone 被迫详述人工智能驱动的能源利润
item.description: 最近，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Recent takeovers of public utilities by BlackRock Inc. and Blackstone Inc. are drawing scrutiny from Democratic US senators, who are asking the firms to show whether they’re profiting from rising energy demands at consumers’ expense.】

item.title: 德国风力发电量激增，温暖天气抑制电价上涨
item.description: 德国的风力发电量将在下周初创下历史新高，这意味着在需求持续低迷的情况下，可再生能源可能会满足该国几乎所有的电力需求。【原文：German wind generation is set to climb to a record early next week, meaning renewables may meet almost all the country’s power needs as demand remains subdued.】

item.title: 阿根廷将以美元出售地方法律债券，迎接 Milei 势头
item.description: 阿根廷宣布将以美元出售地方法律债券，以抓住哈维尔-米莱伊总统在 10 月国会中期选举中大获全胜后的积极势头。【原文：Argentina announced it will sell a local law bond in dollars, seizing on positive momentum after President Javier Milei’s resounding win in October’s congressional midterms.】

item.title: 渣打银行在伦敦就 15 亿英镑的伊朗制裁诉讼达成和解
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）因被指控系统性地违反对伊朗的制裁以赢得新业务而与投资者达成了价值 15 亿英镑（20 亿美元）的和解。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc has settled an investor lawsuit worth £1.5 billion ($2 billion) over allegations it systematically breached sanctions against Iran to win new business.】

item.title: 可可堆积在象牙海岸港口，买家面临现金短缺问题
item.description: 由于国际价格下跌和当地出口商资金紧张，农民们急于寻找买家，象牙海岸港口正面临着可可暂时过剩的问题。【原文：Ivory Coast is facing a temporary glut of cocoa at its ports as farmers rush to find buyers due to falling international prices and a cash crunch affecting local exporters.】

item.title: 普京的战争让俄罗斯石油业付出越来越高的代价
item.description: 对俄罗斯基础设施的攻击节奏不断加快，考验着俄罗斯的应变能力。【原文：The rising tempo of attacks on Russian infrastructure is testing the country’s resilience.】

item.title: 印度家庭的物价压力明显缓解
item.description: 印度中央银行的调查显示，印度家庭目前正目睹价格压力的显著缓解，并预计在未来 12 个月内，所有主要产品类别的价格压力都将持续。【原文：Indian households are witnessing a significant easing in price pressures now and expect it to continue over the next 12 months across all major product categories, according to surveys conducted by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: IndiGo 航班取消，数千人受困，愤怒沸腾
item.description: 印度最大的航空公司 IndiGo 频繁取消航班，导致许多人错过了婚礼，错失了商机，同时也激怒了滞留在航站楼的家人。【原文：Sweeping flight cancellations by India’s largest carrier, IndiGo, are leaving behind a trail of missed weddings and lost business opportunities — and flaring tempers with families left stranded at terminals.】

item.title: Netflix 将以 720 亿美元现金和股票收购华纳兄弟公司
item.description: Netflix Inc. 同意收购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Netflix Inc. agreed to buy Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. in a historic combination, joining the world’s dominant paid streaming service with one of Hollywood’s oldest and most revered studios.】

item.title: 对 OpenAI 的索拉（Sora）的热情在最初的创意爆发后逐渐消退
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，Ellen Huet 报道 OpenAI 的视频生成器 Sora。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet reports on OpenAI’s video generator, Sora, after an initial burst of interest.】

item.title: 通常的降息转嫁可能不适用于当前的美国经济
item.description: 即使美联储下周降息，经济受益的时间也可能比往常更长。【原文：Even if the Federal Reserve cuts rates next week, benefits to the economy may take longer than usual.】

item.title: 大手笔锂矿商 SQM 加入智利混合债券热潮
item.description: 在过去的四个月里，智利巨型锂生产商 SQM 已成为第三家在当地市场上出售混合票据的智利公司。【原文：The giant lithium producer SQM has become the third Chilean company to sell hybrid notes in the local market in the past four months, as companies look to finance multi-billion investments without damaging their credit score.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克和捷克亿万富翁斯特尔纳德将向欧盟提供 580 亿欧元弹药
item.description: 斯洛伐克与捷克亿万富翁米哈尔-斯特纳德（Michal Strnad）合作，提出提供价值高达 580 亿欧元（680 亿美元）的大中口径弹药，供欧盟成员国在 7 年内使用 SAFE 基金购买。【原文：Slovakia, working with Czech billionaire Michal Strnad, offered to supply up to €58 billion ($68 billion) worth of large and medium-caliber ammunition for European Union member states to purchase with SAFE funds over seven years.】

item.title: 即使美联储再次降息，美国经济可能也不会有太大起色
item.description: 美联储官员准备在下周再次降息，但对经济的任何好处都可能需要比正常情况下更长的时间才能显现出来，而且可能会被货币政策无法控制的因素所削弱。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are poised to cut interest rates again next week, but any benefit to the economy is likely to take much longer to show up than normal and may be blunted by factors that monetary policy can’t control.】

item.title: ITT 同意以 48 亿美元收购 Lone Star 旗下的 SPX Flow 公司
item.description: ITT 公司已同意以 47.75 亿美元的现金和股票交易从 Lone Star Funds 收购工业设备制造商 SPX Flow 公司。【原文：ITT Inc. has agreed to acquire industrial equipment manufacturer SPX Flow Inc. from Lone Star Funds in a $4.775 billion cash and stock deal.】

item.title: 通胀数据公布前美债将迎来六个月来最差一周
item.description: 随着投资者为一系列美国通胀和情绪数据做好准备，国债将迎来六个月来最糟糕的一周。【原文：Treasuries are on track for their worst week in six months as investors brace for a slate of US inflation and sentiment data.】

item.title: 南非队主教练伊拉斯姆斯将执教南非橄榄球队至 2031 年
item.description: 南非与拉西-伊拉斯姆斯续约四年，继续担任世界排名最高的国家橄榄球队主教练。【原文：South Africa has extended the contract of Rassie Erasmus as coach of the world’s highest-ranked national rugby team for a further four years.】
